alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 4:16PM CDT until May 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Oklahoma City, or 4 miles west of Mustang, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, Yukon, Bethany, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Woodlawn Park, and Richland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
